TopicTitle: Different sizes stock solar panels and radiators

Articles.Content:
Before someone reply this post sayng that i'm breaking the rule of suggesting parts, at the end of the what not to suggest it says that if you are specific you can feel free to suggest your ideas.

I really would like to see more sizes os solar panels beacuse we only have a bunch of small and tiny solar panels an a big solar panel, i would like to see an half size solar panel and a bigger solar panels, it can make stock space stations building more interesting.

I also want to suggest to add radiators, as you may know big ships such as ISS and mir acumulate heat and they use radiators to deliver that heat and make human life to be possible in the interior of the space stations, if they add radiators i think there should be 4 sizes radiators, tiny for the smaller ships, small for the 1 kerbal ships, medium for 3 kerbal ships and big for the space stations

PD: sorry for my English I'm from Spain
